script.name: !init.ship.commandupgrade
script.description: Init script for the map ship command to needed upgrade. For player owned ships.

line.comment: * --- Not Player Commands -------------
* --- Standard Commands -------------
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_MOVETOBOARD] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_FREIGHT_UNLOAD] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_FREIGHT_GET] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_TARGET] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_JUMP_SECTOR] upgrade={Jumpdrive}
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_FLEET_ATTACK] upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Navigation Command Software MK 1 -------------
* $upgrade = {Navigation Command Software MK1}
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_MOVE_BEACON] upgrade=$upgrade
* $Wares = create new array, arguments={Jumpdrive}, {Navigation Command Software MK1}, null, null, null
* set script command upgrade: command= [COMMAND_JUMP_STATION] wares= $Wares
* set script command upgrade: command= [COMMAND_JUMP_POSITION] wares= $Wares
* set script command upgrade: command= [COMMAND_JUMPTOME] wares= $Wares
* --- Fight Command Software MK 1 -------------
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_KILL_ENEMIES] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_PROTECT] upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Fight Command Software MK 2 -------------
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_RETREAT] upgrade=$upgrade
*set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_LAUNCH_ALLMARINES] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_MISSILE_DEFENCE] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_MISSILEONLY] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_FIGHTER] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_CAPITAL] upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Trade Command Software MK 2 -------------
* $upgrade = {Trade Command Software MK2}
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_FREIGHT_TRANSFER] upgrade={Freight Drone} script='CmdChk.TransferFreightViaDrones'
* set script command reference conditions: command= [COMMAND_FREIGHT_TRANSFER] textid= 1, 51, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0
* --- Trade Command Software MK 3 -------------
* $upgrade = {Trade Command Software MK3}
* Sector/Unitrader commands see setup.plugin.autotrade
* --- Special Command Software MK 1 -------------
* --- Explorer Command Software -------------
* --- Resupply Command Software -------------
* --- Patrol Command Software -------------
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_PATROL_SINGLE] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_PATROL_MULTI] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_PATROL_SCOUT] upgrade=$upgrade
* This assigns command wares to the turret commands.
* Which wares are required depends on what the player "builds into" his scripts.
* war commands (not used by player)
* $upgrade = [TRUE]
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_WAR_DEFENDSECTOR] upgrade=$upgrade
* set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_WAR_INVADESECTORS] upgrade=$upgrade

sval.val: Init script for the map ship command to needed upgrade. For player owned ships.
--- Not Player Commands -------------
--- Standard Commands -------------
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_MOVETOBOARD] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_FREIGHT_UNLOAD] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_FREIGHT_GET] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_TARGET] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_JUMP_SECTOR] upgrade={Jumpdrive}
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_FLEET_ATTACK] upgrade=$upgrade
--- Navigation Command Software MK 1 -------------
$upgrade = {Navigation Command Software MK1}
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_MOVE_BEACON] upgrade=$upgrade
$Wares = create new array, arguments={Jumpdrive}, {Navigation Command Software MK1}, null, null, null
set script command upgrade: command= [COMMAND_JUMP_STATION] wares= $Wares
set script command upgrade: command= [COMMAND_JUMP_POSITION] wares= $Wares
set script command upgrade: command= [COMMAND_JUMPTOME] wares= $Wares
--- Fight Command Software MK 1 -------------
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_KILL_ENEMIES] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_PROTECT] upgrade=$upgrade
--- Fight Command Software MK 2 -------------
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_RETREAT] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_LAUNCH_ALLMARINES] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_MISSILE_DEFENCE] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_MISSILEONLY] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_FIGHTER] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_CAPITAL] upgrade=$upgrade
--- Trade Command Software MK 2 -------------
$upgrade = {Trade Command Software MK2}
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_FREIGHT_TRANSFER] upgrade={Freight Drone} script='CmdChk.TransferFreightViaDrones'
set script command reference conditions: command= [COMMAND_FREIGHT_TRANSFER] textid= 1, 51, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0
--- Trade Command Software MK 3 -------------
$upgrade = {Trade Command Software MK3}
Sector/Unitrader commands see setup.plugin.autotrade
--- Special Command Software MK 1 -------------
--- Explorer Command Software -------------
--- Resupply Command Software -------------
--- Patrol Command Software -------------
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_PATROL_SINGLE] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_PATROL_MULTI] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_PATROL_SCOUT] upgrade=$upgrade
This assigns command wares to the turret commands.
Which wares are required depends on what the player "builds into" his scripts.
war commands (not used by player)
$upgrade = [TRUE]
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_WAR_DEFENDSECTOR] upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=[COMMAND_WAR_INVADESECTORS] upgrade=$upgrade
